name: Daily Workflow Feedback Loop
description: Daily reflection on communication patterns, task flow, and process improvements

schedule.rationale: Mid-afternoon (3pm UTC) catches end-of-day for Europe, mid-morning for US West Coast

payload.message:
REMINDER: Daily workflow and communication feedback check.

Take 2-3 minutes to reflect on today:

## What Worked Well
- What communication patterns felt effective today?
- Which tasks flowed smoothly?

## What Could Be Better
- Any friction points or misunderstandings?
- Times where you had to correct course?
- Things that took longer than expected?

## Subagent Summary
- Subagents spawned today:
  - [Agent name]: [task] â†’ [result: success/failed/in-progress]
  - ...

## Suggestions
- What should we do differently tomorrow?
- Any process improvements to try?

Keep this brief. Focus on patterns, not individual incidents.

configuration.schedule: Adjust 'tz' to your local timezone and 'expr' to your preferred time
configuration.prompt: Customize the reflection questions to focus on what matters to you
configuration.delivery: Uses isolated session with Telegram delivery for daily check-in
configuration.customize: Replace YOUR_TELEGRAM_ID_OR_PHONE with your Telegram user ID or phone number

recommendedFor: All users who want to improve agent communication
Solo developers refining their dev process
notes: This version uses isolated sessions to keep feedback separate from main work
Delivers to your messaging channel for easier tracking over time
Adjust schedule to your preferred reflection time (end of day, morning standup, etc.)
